sentence.Network_en: A lucky thought occurred to him, to send Bellerophon to combat with the Chimaera.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然,他有个好主意, 派柏勒洛丰去和喀迈拉搏斗.

sentence.Network_en: The term chimaera refers to an organism which , a mosaic, has more than one cell type.
sentence.Network_cn: 象镶嵌性一样, 嵌合体指的是生物具有一种以上细胞类型.

sentence.Network_en: The Star Destroyer Chimaera was part of the Imperial fleet amassed at the Battle of Endor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一路高升,最后成为副舰长.
